Entries.MisterGinger: adult/rude/outgoing/neutral/male/non-datable/null/Town/summer 22//AnimalShop 7 16/Mr.Ginger

Oooh, an offering of tribute! I love it. *purrs*/130 139 148 198 227 267 424 426 715/Oooh, a gift for me? This is great!/-4 168 95 50 125 195 209 228 305 444 446 684 685 732/This is for me? Am I supposed to... eat it?/-81 -2 -75 -79 -7/I don't appreciate being mocked, @./2 220 221 222 223 -26 395/Oh, you got me a gift. Whatever.//
Murrrr.....$2
Gah, I hate rain. Still, a good excuse to stay inside and sleep, right?
Murr!
A festival to celebrate those miniature dinosaurs? Why?$2#$b#And the tiny little ones, they're not even a mouthful. Not worth the effort.
I've told you before, and I'll tell you again. Cats. Don't. Dance.$2
Mirrp?
I wouldn't eat the soup if I were you. It's gonna taste like mouse entrails and old socks. #$b#Why? Cos that's what I added.$3
Mirrup!
They're not made of jelly, and they're not fish.#$b#Why do humans give things stupid names?
Mirrup!
I don't know about you, but I'm only here for the food.#$b#And this guy's a totally sloppy eater.
Me-ow?
I'm hiding, @, what do you think?#$b#What if I'm this golden 'Pumpkin' that everyone is looking for?$2
Mirp!
*singing* 'Fish, fish, my favorite dish'. Oh, hello @.$2#$b#Do you think if I ask nicely, they'll let me take some of these home?$5#$b#They're just gonna toss 'em back? What a waste.$2
Murrr...$5
What? I'm not sulking cos no-one brought me a gift!$5#$b#I just needed some alone time, okay?$2

Entries.50706117/f MisterGinger 500/t 1400 1700/: springtown/43 75/Emily -100 -100 2 MisterGinger 45 71 0 farmer 38 72 2/skippable/pause 500/animate MisterGinger false true 250 18 19/playSound cat/pause 700/move farmer 3 0 1/pause 250/stopAnimation MisterGinger/animate MisterGinger false false 250 17 16/pause 500/faceDirection MisterGinger 3/pause 250/playSound cat/pause 1000/animate MisterGinger false false 250 16 17/pause 500/animate MisterGinger false true 250 18 19/pause 500/pause 250/playSound cat/emote farmer 8/playSound stoneStep/pause 250/stopAnimation MisterGinger/pause 250/move MisterGinger 0 1 0/move MisterGinger 1 0 3/playSound doorOpen/warp Emily 45 71/pause 250/playSound cat/pause 250/playSound cat/pause 250/speak Emily "Hello Osiris!$1"/pause 250/speak MisterGinger "Mirrrp?$2"/pause 250/speak Emily "Okay, okay... Don't tell Gus!$3"/move MisterGinger 1 0 3/move MisterGinger 0 1 3/pause 250/playSound cat/move Emily 0 1 1/pause 250/playSound woodyStep/addObject 46 72 142/move MisterGinger -1 0 0/pause 250/playSound cat/pause 250/animate MisterGinger false false 250 42 43/animate MisterGinger false true 350 43 44 45 46/pause 500/speak Emily "Oh, you are hungry, aren't you, Osiris?$2"/pause 250/move farmer 2 0 1/pause 250/emote farmer 8/pause 250/faceDirection Emily 3/pause 250/jump Emily 4/pause 250/speak Emily "Oh, hello @! You surprised me.$1"/pause 250/pause 250/speak Emily "You're not going to tell Gus are you?$2"/pause 250/emote farmer 32/pause 250/speak Emily "Phew. I know Osiris lives on the ranch, and he's probably well fed - but he always seems so hungry.$3"/pause 250/stopAnimation MisterGinger/removeObject 46 72/pause 250/pause 250/animate MisterGinger false false 250 24 25 26 27 28/pause 1250/animate MisterGinger false true 120 29 30 29 28/playSound cat/pause 500/speak Emily "He's a very special creature, Osiris. Sometimes I get the feeling that he's more than just a cat.$4"/pause 500/playSound cat/speak Emily "Although maybe there's no such thing as 'just a cat'!$1"/pause 500/pause 250/question null "What do you think?#There's definitely something unique about him!#All cats have a mind of their own."/pause 500/textAboveHead Emily "Too right!"/pause 250/showFrame MisterGinger 25/playSound cat/pause 250/pause 500/faceDirection Emily 2/speak Emily "Did you like that, Osiris?$3"/pause 250/speak MisterGinger "Mirp!$1"/animate Misterginger false true 120 29 30 29 28/pause 250/textAboveHead Emily "I'm glad!"/pause 250/faceDirection Emily 3/pause 250/speak Emily "He appeared in town soon after Jas arrived here. She was just a tiny girl, recently orphaned. It was so sad!$2#$b#Nobody knew where he came from, or who he belonged to, but do you know what?$3#$b#... I believe he's her guardian angel.$4"/pause 500/playSound cat/pause 500/playSound stoneStep/pause 250/speak Emily "Oops, I'd better go. Gus'll be wondering what I've got up to. Goodbye @, and goodbye Osiris. See you 'round!"/faceDirection Emily 0/pause 250/move Emily 0 -1 0/playSound doorOpen/warp Emily -100 -100/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 1/stopAnimation MisterGinger/move MisterGinger -2 0 3/pause 250/speak MisterGinger "Murrrrr?$2"/pause 500/emote farmer 32/pause 1000/end

Dropped by to join us for some exercise, did you?$1"/move Marnie 0 -1 1/pause 250/faceDirection MisterGinger 3/pause 500/textAboveHead MisterGinger "Mirp!"/pause 500/stopAnimation Robin/faceDirection Robin 0/pause 500/speak Robin "Hello kitty! You've met Mr. Ginger, right?$1"/pause 250/emote Caroline 40/pause 500/speak Caroline "Okay ladies, we're here to exercise, not fawn over a silly cat.$3"/pause 500/stopAnimation MisterGinger/faceDirection MisterGinger 0/faceDirection Marnie 0/pause 500/playSound cat/speak MisterGinger "Murrrrrr....$5"/pause 500/shake Marnie 350/pause 500/speak Marnie "Oh no, now you've ticked him off!$2"/pause 500/move Pierre 0 3 1/textAboveHead Pierre "Hey!"/faceDirection Marnie 3/faceDirection farmer 3/faceDirection Caroline 3/faceDirection Jodi 3/faceDirection Robin 3/faceDirection MisterGinger 3/animate MisterGinger false true 250 20 21/pause 500/speak Pierre "What's that cat doing in here?$3#$b#You know I'm A-A-A-aaa-CHOO!!!$2"/shake Pierre 350/pause 1000/end

Entries.Wizard_CatTalk: Greetings young adept,^ Our mutual acquaintance has requested your presence in my tower, after the hours of darkness. Please bring a fragment of the Void. ^    -M. Rasmodius, Wizard.[#]An invitation

Entries.50706121/f MisterGinger 1500/t 1800 2400: WizardSong/-1000 -1000/farmer -100 -100 0 Wizard 3 17 2 MisterGinger 2 17 1/removeItem 769/skippable/viewport 8 19/pause 1000/faceDirection Wizard 3/speak Wizard "I'm sorry I cannot help you with your more pressing problem, Trix. But perhaps... well, none of us can know what the future holds."/pause 500/playSound cat/pause 250/speak Wizard "Oh yes, correct, except for Madame Welwick, but she's staying mute on this particular topic."/pause 500/playSound cat/pause 1000/playSound cat/speak Wizard "I know, I know. But patience, they say, is a virtue, and perhaps... well perhaps tonight will set the cogs in motion... the wheel turning..."/playSound cat/pause 250/speak Wizard "Okay, yes, I'm waffling again. I've been alone too long, my friend."/pause 500/playSound stoneStep/faceDirection MisterGinger 2/faceDirection Wizard 2/pause 250/speak Wizard "And right on time. Our guest has arrived."/pause 500/playSound doorOpen/warp farmer 8 24/move farmer 0 -4 0/pause 250/speak Wizard "Hello @, I'm pleased you could join us."/move farmer -2 0 3/move farmer 0 -3 3/pause 500/playSound cat/pause 250/faceDirection Wizard 3/speak Wizard "Yes, yes I know. Please, patience!"/pause 500/faceDirection Wizard 1/speak Wizard "Have you brought the item requested, @?"/pause 500/move farmer -2 0 3/pause 250/playSound coin/speak Wizard "Excellent, this should fulfil my requirements precisely. Let us begin!#$b#What are we brewing? Oh, that's a surprise.$h"/move Wizard 0 2 2/faceDirection farmer 2/faceDirection MisterGinger 1/pause 500/speak Wizard "Right, here we go: an ounce of powdered stardust. A dram of pigeon's blood. The petals of a fairy rose.#$b#And, thanks to you, @, the final ingredient, the coup de grace: a fragment of darkness, a splinter from the heart of the void..."/pause 250/playSound cat/speak Wizard "You get the idea!$h"/pause 500/playSound dropItemInWater/move farmer 0 2 2/pause 250/showFrame Wizard 18/showFrame 96/pause 1000/speak Wizard "Here. Drink up. I know last time was less than pleasant, but the benefit outweighs the cost, does it not?$h"/pause 800/emote farmer 28/faceDirection MisterGinger 1/playSound cat/pause 500/showFrame Wizard 19/pause 800/showFrame farmer 90/faceDirection Wizard 2/pause 1000/farmerEat 184/pause 4000/playSound gulp/move farmer 0 -1 2/animate farmer false true 350 104 105/pause 4000/globalFade .008/viewport -1000 -1000/stopAnimation farmer/faceDirection farmer 2/warp MisterGinger 5 18/warp Wizard 3 18 1/faceDirection Wizard 1/faceDirection MisterGinger 3/playMusic none/pause 500/viewport 8 19 true/pause 500/speak MisterGinger "@? @!$2"/pause 500/speak MisterGinger "Hello? @? Did it work?$2"/pause 500/emote Wizard 8/pause 500/speak MisterGinger "@? Are you okay?"/pause 250/quickQuestion #I can't feel my feet.#Oh look, a talking cat!#It needed a slice of lemon.#That's the last time I'm drinking anything you offer!(break)emote Wizard 40\speak Wizard "I must say, that's rather an unexpected side effect, but I'm sure it'll wear off in no time.#$b#No time at all"(break)speak MisterGinger "It worked! It actually worked. Sorry I doubted you, Ras.$4"(break)speak MisterGinger "Hey Ras, sounds like someone appreciates your culinary talents!"(break)speak Wizard "You say that now, @, but you cannot deny that my brews are quite beneficial."/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 500/emote farmer 16/speak MisterGinger "Hey, @. It's great to have someone else to talk to.#$b#I mean, Ras is fine - but he's a bit tail-in-the-air, don't you think?...$1"/pause 250/emote Wizard 12/pause 500/speak Wizard "I can hear you, you know. Kitty."/pause 250/speak MisterGinger "Kitty... He knows I hate that name. So demeaning. Like I'm some sort of common house pet.$5#$b#Please don't ever call me kitty, @.$1"/emote farmer 32/pause 1000/end

Entries.50706126/f MisterGinger 2000/k 2118991/t: nightTime/-1000 -1000/Jas -100 -100 0 Shane -100 -100 0 MisterGinger 86 17 3 farmer 93 23 3/skippable/viewport 93 21/pause 500/move MisterGinger -1 0 0/playSound cat/pause 500/move MisterGinger 1 0 0/pause 500/playSound cat/pause 500/move MisterGinger -1 0 0/animate MisterGinger false false 250 16 17 18 19 18 19 18 19/playSound cat/pause 1500/pause 250/move farmer -3 0 0/playSound woodyStep/pause 250/faceDirection MisterGinger 2/jump MisterGinger 3/pause 500/move MisterGinger 0 1 1/pause 500/speak MisterGinger "@! I'm so glad you're here!#$b#I need your help!$2"/pause 500/emote farmer 8/speed MisterGinger 4/move MisterGinger 4 0 2/speed farmer 4/move farmer 0 -5 0/pause 500/faceDirection MisterGinger 1/faceDirection farmer 3/speak MisterGinger "It's Jas! She's inside and she's scared and alone, and I can't get to her!$2"/pause 500/emote farmer 16/pause 500/speak MisterGinger "She has terrible nightfears! Marnie's out, and Shane's sleeping like the great useless meathead he is!$2"/pause 250/move MisterGinger -1 0 3/pause 250/move MisterGinger 1 0 1/speak MisterGinger "There's a key under that fake rock by the door."/pause 250/move MisterGinger -1 0 3/pause 250/move MisterGinger 1 0 1/pause 500/question fork1 "Please, will you help me?#Of course I will!#Why? I'm not a babysitter."/fork NoHelpMrG/pause 500/move farmer 0 -2 1/emote MisterGinger 20/playSound stoneCrack/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 0/pause 500/move MisterGinger 0 -2 0/playSound openChest/globalfade/viewport -1000 -1000/viewport -1000 -1000/stopMusic/changeLocation AnimalShop/warp Jas 3 6/warp Shane 4 6/warp farmer 10 18/warp MissterGinger 9 18/faceDirection Shane 2/showFrame Shane 53/faceDirection Jas 1/faceDirection MisterGinger 3/faceDirection farmer 3/viewport 11 11/pause 500/move MisterGinger -3 0 0/move MisterGinger 0 -5 0/doAction 6 12/pause 500/speak Shane "...And the princess lowered her lips to press a careful kiss on the frog's slimy head..."/shake MisterGinger 350/pause 500/emote MisterGinger 40/showFrame Shane 52/pause 500/speak Jas "Ewww!$3"/move farmer -3 0 0/move farmer 0 -3 3/pause 500/showFrame Shane 53/speak Shane "...There came a spark of light, bright enough to dazzle the princess.#$b#When her vision cleared, there, before her, crouched a man."/emote Jas 20/showFrame Shane 54/pause 500/speak Jas "Not a man, a prince! A handsome prince."/pause 500/showFrame Shane 12/pause 500/emote Shane 40/pause 500/speak Shane "No, not a prince. A simple farm boy, who loved her with all his heart.#$b#And if he had slightly bulgy eyes, and clammy skin, what of it?$1"/pause 500/speak Jas "Ick!$3#$b#Uncle Shane, you're so funny.$1"/pause 500/speak Shane "Thank you. But seriously, kiddo, you don't need a prince to be happy.$3"/pause 500/speak Jas "I know! You just need to know there's someone who cares.$4#$b#Right?$1"/pause 500/speak Shane "Yeah, that's right, sweetheart.$l#$b#Now, you ready to go back to sleep yet? Nightmare forgotten?#$b#...(Uncle Shane needs to rest his aching head)..."/pause 500/emote Jas 32/pause 500/speak Jas "It's not forgotten. But better. Yes, better.$3#$b#I think I can sleep now."/pause 500/speak Shane "Good kiddo, let's get you tucked back into bed."/move Jas 0 1 2/speak Jas "Goodnight Uncle Shane. Thank you. That made me feel much better.$1"/pause 500/move Jas -2 0 2/showFrame Jas 25/move Shane -1 0 2/move Shane 0 1 3/pause 500/emote Shane 20/pause 500/viewport 11 13/move MisterGinger 0 1 1/showFrame MisterGinger 38/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 0/showFrame MisterGinger 4/speak MisterGinger "She didn't need me after all. She has him now.$2"/quickQuestion #She'll always need you. He's just her uncle - but you're her CAT!#Kids get bored of their pets, it's true.#You're just a cat, Shane's her Uncle.#You'll always have me, Mr. Ginger.(break)speak MisterGinger "Thank you. That makes me feel much better.$1"(break)speak MisterGinger "I'm just a pet...? No! I'm her friend...$2#$b#And I won't let you tell me otherwise!$5"(break)speak MisterGinger "Family are more important than pets. I get it.$2#$b#I don't like it, but I get it.$2"(break)speak MisterGinger "Really? Thank you, @. That means a lot.$4"/pause 1000/speak Jas "*sleepily* Mr. Ginger? Mr. Ginger? Is that you?"/pause 500/jump MisterGinger 3/emote MisterGinger 16/pause 500/speak MisterGinger "Bye @! Gotta go!$3"/speed MisterGinger 4/move MisterGinger 0 -7 3/move Shane 1 0 0/move Shane 0 -1 3/move Shane 2 0 2/faceDirection Jas 1/speed MisterGinger 4/move MisterGinger -3 0 3/emote MisterGinger 20/move Shane 0 2 3/speak Shane "She really loves that cat."/move Shane 0 7 2/faceDirection Shane 1/pause 250/showFrame Shane 18/jump Shane 4/pause 250/emote Shane 40/pause 500/emote farmer 60/pause 1000/end warpOut
Entries.NoHelpMrG: pause 500/speak MisterGinger "You won't help me comfort a scared child?$5#$b#You're a terrible person, @. I can't believe I considered you my friend.$2"/friendship MisterGinger -500/pause 250/animate MisterGinger false false 250 12 20 21 20 21/pause 2000/speak MisterGinger "Don't worry Jas! I'm here!"/move MisterGinger -1 0 0/playSound cat/pause 500/end warpOut

Entries.50706132/f MisterGinger 2500/f Linus 100: nightTime/-1000 -1000/MisterGinger 50 37 1 Linus 50 36 1 farmer -100 -100 0/addTemporaryActor VoidGolem 16 24 56 33 0 false/showFrame VoidGolem 18/skippable/viewport 46 37/pause 500/speak Linus "Not a bad haul, Marmalade.#$b#We'll eat well tonight!"/pause 500/faceDirection Linus 2/faceDirection MisterGinger 0/speak Linus "Although I'm sure Marnie feeds you well."/pause 500/move Linus 3 0 1/move MisterGinger 5 0 1/pause 500/faceDirection MisterGinger 3/speak MisterGinger "Marnie feeds me? I'm more than capable of feeding myself, thank you very much.$1#$b#Reigning Champion Mouser of the Ranch eight years in a row!$4#$b#Although yes, I do appreciate the cheese and fish.#1"/pause 500/speak Linus "Thanks for keeping me company this evening."/faceDirection Linus 0/pause 250/faceDirection Linus 1/pause 250/shake Linus 250/speak Linus "Something feels a little... off... tonight, don't you think?"/pause 500/faceDirection MisterGinger 0/pause 500/speak MisterGinger "It smells like clouds on the edge of a storm.$2"/pause 500/speak Linus "The void is restless.#$b#We should hurry."/speed Linus 4/move Linus 3 0 0/pause 500/move Linus 0 -2 0/animate VoidGolem false false 250 18 19 20/jump Linus/animate VoidGolem false false 250 21 22 23 24 0/playSound shadowHit/speed Linus 8/move Linus 4 0 1/speed Linus 8/move Linus 0 2 0/shake Linus 350/pause 500/faceDirection VoidGolem 1/emote MisterGinger 16/animate VoidGolem false true 250 28 29 28 29/pause 500/move VoidGolem 1 0 1/speed MisterGinger 5/move MisterGinger 0 -4 1/speak MisterGinger "Hey, you! void-breath!$5#$b#Leave my friend alone!$5"/stopAnimation VoidGolem/pause 500/faceDirection VoidGolem 3/pause 500/textAboveHead VoidGolem "Kit-ty?"/pause 500/move VoidGolem -1 0 3/speak MisterGinger "Don't call me kitty!$5"/animate MisterGinger false false 250 52 53 52 53/pause 500/specificTemporarySprite swordswipe 56 33/pause 250/playSound shadowHit/pause 500/move VoidGolem 1 0 3/animate VoidGolem false true 250 30 31/pause 500/move MisterGinger 1 0 1/animate MisterGinger false false 250 52 53 52 53/specificTemporarySprite swordswipe 57 33/playSound shadowHit/pause 500/move MisterGinger -1 0 1/move VoidGolem 1 0 3/showFrame MisterGinger 38/pause 500/faceDirection VoidGolem 1/move VoidGolem 1 0 1/pause 500/speed MisterGinger 5/move MisterGinger 3 0 1/faceDirection VoidGolem 3/animate MisterGinger false false 250 52 53 52 53/pause 500/specificTemporarySprite swordswipe 58 33/playSound shadowHit/showFrame VoidGolem 25/pause 250/playSound shadowDie/warp VoidGolem -100 -100/move MisterGinger 1 0 2/showFrame MisterGinger 38/pause 500/speak Linus "Marmalade? Are you okay?"/move Linus 0 -3 3/speak Linus "You saved my life! You're a hero!"/pause 500/playSound cat/speak Linus "Oh, you're hurt! We'd better get you patched up."/pause 1000/end dialogue MisterGinger "Oh don't fuss, @, it's just a scratch and Linus patched me up good.$2#$b#Actually, please do fuss. It hurts! Some cheese might help me heal.$2"

Entries.50706133/e 50706132/t 0600 1200/w sunny: MarlonsTheme/14 23/farmer 7 23 1 Marlon 14 20 2 MisterGinger -100 -100 2/skippable/pause 1000/move farmer 2 0 1/pause 500/showFrame Marlon 12/pause 1000/speak Marlon "Ah, @! I was just coming down to visit the town."/showFrame Marlon 0/move farmer 6 0 0/emote farmer 40/pause 500/speak Marlon "I bumped into my good friend Linus this morning, and I was wondering if, erm, if you happpen to have seen 'Marmalade'around?"/pause 500/move farmer 0 -2 3/emote farmer 8/pause 500/speak Marlon "I believe he also goes by the names of: Osiris, Trix and Mr. Ginger, among others?"/warp MisterGinger 0 23/move MisterGinger 7 0 1/pause 500/speak MisterGinger "Did someone say my name? Not that I'm in the habit of coming when called but, well...#$b#... Ah, hello Marlon!"/pause 500/showFrame Marlon 5/move MisterGinger 7 0 0/move MisterGinger 0 -2 0/showFrame Marlon 4/speak MisterGinger "It's been a while! Still living with the old man up in that house on the mountain?$1#$b#Daydreaming about a life that could have been - if you'd only followed your heart, instead of your stubborn conscience?$1"/pause 500/speak Marlon "Talkative, isn't he?"/faceDirection MisterGinger 1/pause 500/speak MisterGinger "Marlon never learned to 'listen'.$4"/faceDirection MisterGinger 0/pause 500/speak MisterGinger "So, graybeard, what brings you down from the mountains?#$b#You know, you should pop down and say 'hi' to Marnie while you're here.#$b#She mopes and reads nauseating paperbacks; she's waiting for a pirate to sweep her off her feet.$3"/pause 500/faceDirection MisterGinger 1/pause 500/speak MisterGinger "See, can't understand a word I'm saying. Silly humans. Need to clean their ears out."/emote farmer 40/pause 500/speak Marlon "Well, this is somewhat unusual, but I've come here with a proposal."/pause 500/emote MisterGinger 8/faceDirection MisterGinger 0/speak MisterGinger "A proposal? What's your offer?$1"/pause 500/showFrame Marlon 0/speak Marlon "I hear your cat has been quite the hero, @."/pause 500/emote MisterGinger 12/pause 500/faceDirection MisterGinger 0/speak MisterGinger "I'm right here, graybeard, you can talk to me you know!"/pause 500/speak Marlon "And we were wondering if he might be interested in joining the Adventurer's Guild?"/pause 500/emote MisterGinger 16/jump MisterGinger 3/pause 500/speak MisterGinger "The Adventurer's Guild! Me? A defender of the town!$4"/pause 500/speak Marlon "It's dangerous work, I mean, how do you think I lost my eye?#$b#But what do you say?"/pause 500/faceDirection MisterGinger 1/speak MisterGinger "The chance to protect Jas and everyone else, why it would be an honor! But what do you think, @?"/quickQuestion #You're brave and strong, and they need you!#You've got to follow what's right by you.#I don't want to see you get hurt.#You, a defender? You're a cat!(break)speak MisterGinger "I am, aren't I. I'm so glad you recognise that!"(break)speak MisterGinger "You're very wise... but yes, I think this is it!"(break)speak MisterGinger "I don't want to get hurt either, @. But I'm fast, and cunning and wily. I can do this!"(break)speak MisterGinger "And your point is? Does being a cat make me weak?#$b#My teeth and my claws are my weapons, @.#$b#Wanna challenge me?$5"/pause 1000/emote Marlon 8/pause 500/speak Marlon "Is that a 'yes'?"/pause 500/faceDirection MisterGinger 0/pause 500/showFrame MisterGinger 40/pause 500/playSound cat/pause 500/showFrame Marlon 4/speak Marlon "Are you prepared to swear the oath of allegiance?"/pause 500/playSound cat/pause 500/showFrame MisterGinger 41/showFrame MisterGinger 42/pause 500/showFrame MisterGinger 43/pause 500/speak Marlon "Very well. Do you, the one known as Marmalade and also, Mr. Ginger, solemnly swear to put the lives of others before your own?"/pause 500/playSound cat/pause 500/showFrame MisterGinger 42/pause 500/showFrame MisterGinger 43/pause 500/speak Marlon "Do you promise to act as guardian and protector?#$b#To guard against the blight of darkness and the pestilence of the void. That which resides within and without."/pause 500/playSound cat/pause 500/showFrame MisterGinger 42/pause 500/showFrame MisterGinger 43/pause 500/speak Marlon "You may rise, noble feline."/pause 500/showFrame MisterGinger 17/pause 500/showFrame MisterGinger 18/pause 500/speak MisterGinger "Thank you for this honor, Marlon. I'll do you proud, I promise."/pause 500/showFrame MisterGinger 25/animate MisterGinger false true 120 29 30 31 30/pause 500/emote Marlon 8/pause 500/emote farmer 32/pause 2000/end

Entries.Wizard_CatTalk: Hello dear!^ Our mutual acquaintance has requested your presence in our tower, after the hours of darkness. Please bring a splinter of the sun. ^    -H. Goddess.[#]An Invitation

Entries.50706121/f MisterGinger 1500/t 1800 2400: WizardSong/-1000 -1000/farmer -100 -100 0 Wizard 3 17 2 MisterGinger 2 17 1/removeItem 768/skippable/viewport 8 19/pause 1000/faceDirection Wizard 3/speak Wizard "I'm sorry I cannot help you with your more pressing problem, Trix. But perhaps... well, who can know what the future holds?"/pause 500/playSound cat/pause 250/speak Wizard "Oh yes, correct, Madame Welwick, but she's staying mute on this particular subject."/pause 500/playSound cat/pause 1000/playSound cat/speak Wizard "I know, I know. But patience, is a virtue, and perhaps... well, perhaps tonight will set things in motion."/playSound cat/pause 250/speak Wizard "Yes, I know, I'm as anxious to see it fulfilled as you, my friend."/pause 500/playSound stoneStep/faceDirection MisterGinger 2/faceDirection Wizard 2/pause 250/speak Wizard "And right on time. Our guest has arrived."/pause 500/playSound doorOpen/warp farmer 8 24/move farmer 0 -4 0/pause 250/speak Wizard "Hello @, I'm pleased you could join us."/move farmer -2 0 3/move farmer 0 -3 3/pause 500/playSound cat/pause 250/faceDirection Wizard 3/speak Wizard "Yes, yes I know. Please, patience!"/pause 500/faceDirection Wizard 1/speak Wizard "Have you brought the item requested, @?"/pause 500/move farmer -2 0 3/pause 250/playSound coin/speak Wizard "Excellent, this is precisely what we required. Let's begin!#$b#What are we brewing? Oh, that's a surprise, but one that I feel shall delight you, my dear.$h"/move Wizard 0 2 2/faceDirection farmer 2/faceDirection MisterGinger 1/pause 500/speak Wizard "Right, here we go: an ounce of powdered stardust. A feather gifted by a visitor from afar. The petals of a fairy rose.#$b#And, thanks to you, @, the final ingredient, the coup de grace: a sliver of the sun..."/pause 250/playSound cat/speak Wizard "Yes, I know, Trix. Please, be patient.$h"/pause 500/playSound dropItemInWater/move farmer 0 2 2/pause 250/showFrame Wizard 18/showFrame 96/pause 1000/speak Wizard "Here, breathe deep. Inhale the magic. Feel it soak into you senses.$h"/pause 800/emote farmer 28/faceDirection MisterGinger 1/playSound cat/move farmer 0 -1 2/pause 500/pause 4000/globalFade .008/viewport -1000 -1000/speak Wizard "@? Please, don't be afraid. We have you. We are here for you."/faceDirection farmer 2/warp MisterGinger 5 18/warp Wizard 3 18 1/faceDirection Wizard 1/faceDirection MisterGinger 3/playMusic none/pause 500/viewport 8 19 true/pause 500/speak MisterGinger "@? @!$2"/pause 500/speak MisterGinger "Hello? @? Did it work?$2"/pause 500/emote Wizard 8/pause 500/speak MisterGinger "@? Are you okay?"/pause 250/quickQuestion #I can't feel my feet.#Oh look, a talking cat!#What happened? Did I faint?(break)emote Wizard 40\speak Wizard "Oh no, my dear! That's an unexpected side effect. It should wear off shortly.#$b#I'm sorry!$2"(break)speak MisterGinger "It worked! It actually worked. Sorry I doubted you, Goddess.$4"(break)speak Wizard "My apologies, @. The potency does, occasionally, make one light-headed."/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 500/emote farmer 16/speak MisterGinger "Hey, @. It's great to have someone else to talk to.#$b#I mean, the Goddess is wonderful - but she's well... she's a goddess!$1"/pause 250/emote Wizard 60/pause 500/speak Wizard "That I may be, Trix, but I'm also your friend."/pause 250/faceDirection farmer 3/speak MisterGinger "I know, and I am honored, Goddess. But sometimes, well... you know.$1"/pause 500/speak Wizard "That I do, my feline friend. Please treat him well, @. For there is more to this cat than meets the eye."/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 1/emote farmer 32/pause 1000/end
